milestones.name: Milestone 0.1: Unmock Codebase
milestones.description: Eliminate mock data and implement real database-backed services

phases.name: Phase 1: Foundation
phases.description: Authentication, Core UI, Feed, Backend Foundation, Email Service

phases.name: Phase 2: Social Interactions
phases.description: Reactions, Comments, Hashtags, Sharing, Social Graph, Posts API

milestones.name: Milestone 1.1: Authentication System
milestones.description: Frontend login/register pages and authentication service with state management

tasks.title: Login Page Implementation
tasks.description: Create login form with validation and auth integration

tasks.title: Registration Page Implementation
tasks.description: Create registration form with email validation and password confirmation

tasks.title: Authentication Service & State Management
tasks.description: Implement AuthService with signals and localStorage persistence

tasks.title: Route Guards Implementation
tasks.description: Create authGuard and guestGuard for protected routes

tasks.title: User Menu & Logout Functionality
tasks.description: Add user dropdown menu with profile, settings, logout options

tasks.description: Button component with variants, sizes, loading states

tasks.description: Text input with validation, error messages, labels

tasks.description: Modal dialog with overlay, close button, actions

tasks.description: Responsive sidebar with menu items and collapse

tasks.description: Top navigation bar with logo, menu, user profile
